desc.en: Sensei visits a nearby beach for a break. However, due to the fame of Schale, they are unable to relax properly. At the end of the day, Hifumi appears in front of Sensei atop of Crusader.
desc.jp: Sensei visits a nearby beach for a break. However, due to the fame of Schale, they are unable to relax properly. At the end of the day, Hifumi appears in front of Sensei atop of Crusader.
desc.zh_cn: 因为难得的休假，老师为了转换心情而来到海边散步。但所到之处一再发生需要协助的事件，导致没怎么休息到。就在此时，搭乘着「十字军酱」的{cf日步美}出现在了老师眼前。两人一起度过了短暂的休息时光。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
夏季限定的佩洛洛大人周边

long.jp: トリニティ総合学園

hobby.en: Collecting Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others
hobby.jp: ペロログッズ集め、可愛いもの集め、ショッピング、相談に乗ること
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 收集佩洛洛周边、收集可爱的物品、购物、与人相谈
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 收集佩洛洛商品、购物、与人谈心
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 收集佩洛洛周边玩具、购物、做倾听者

desc.en: Before the holiday ends, Junko comes to find Sensei in Schale. They go to see the Christmas tree and wander about the shopping complex together. When Junko's stomach growls, the two share dango and wish for a happy new year.
desc.jp: Before the holiday ends, Junko comes to find Sensei in Schale. They go to see the Christmas tree and wander about the shopping complex together. When Junko's stomach growls, the two share dango and wish for a happy new year.
desc.zh_cn: 在连假结束前，{cf淳子}来到了老师所在的{et夏莱}。两人一起去市区欣赏圣诞树和逛商店街。{cf淳子}的肚子突然冒出咕噜噜的声音，两人一起吃了团子后互相说新年快乐。

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.jp: More Food, More Fun! More Me?

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

desc.en: Sensei runs into Serina, who is giving out gifts to children in celebration of the Holy Night. Snow starts to fall and the night grows colder, so Sensei gives Serina a gift of her own.
desc.jp: Sensei runs into Serina, who is giving out gifts to children in celebration of the Holy Night. Snow starts to fall and the night grows colder, so Sensei gives Serina a gift of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 老师遇见了在平安夜分发礼物给孩子们的{cf芹奈}。不知不觉下起雪来了，老师送围巾给怕冷的{cf芹奈}。

long.jp: トリニティ総合学園

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

long.jp: トリニティ総合学園

desc.en: Suzumi invites Sensei to a quiet amusement park. They ride a Ferris wheel together to see the stars in the night sky.
desc.jp: Suzumi invites Sensei to a quiet amusement park. They ride a Ferris wheel together to see the stars in the night sky.
desc.zh_cn: {cf铃美}难得邀请老师来到一个幽静的游乐场。一起搭着摩天轮欣赏夜空的星光。

desc.en: amusement park ferris wheel carousel rotate horse nighttime artificial light outside playground
desc.jp: amusement park ferris wheel carousel rotate horse nighttime artificial light outside playground

long.jp: トリニティ総合学園

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: トリニティ総合学園

desc.en: Early one morning, Toki arrives at Schale. Due to a complicated series of events, Toki has a free day and has decided to spend it with Sensei. After a chaotic day following Toki's requests, Sensei feels a growing concern for their future, now that Toki is firmly a part of it.
desc.jp: Early one morning, Toki arrives at Schale. Due to a complicated series of events, Toki has a free day and has decided to spend it with Sensei. After a chaotic day following Toki's requests, Sensei feels a growing concern for their future, now that Toki is firmly a part of it.
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}一早就来到了{et夏莱}。{cf季}因为一连串的事件而失去了工作，后来得到的结论是和老师一起共事。在{cf季}的辅佐下，老师开始了不平静的一天。老师不禁担心接下来要和{cf季}一起共事的日子。

name.en: Someone You Want to Erase Part 2
name.jp: Someone You Want to Erase Part 2

desc.en: Reisa and Sensei defeat the thugs. Reisa feels responsible for the rumor about Kazusa trying to form a new organization. Reisa decides to protect the "normal" Kazusa and sets out to battle the thugs, while entrusting her challenge letter to Sensei.
desc.jp: Reisa and Sensei defeat the thugs. Reisa feels responsible for the rumor about Kazusa trying to form a new organization. Reisa decides to protect the "normal" Kazusa and sets out to battle the thugs, while entrusting her challenge letter to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: {cf澪纱}和老师一起击退了太妹。关于太妹们听到{cf千纱}要创建新组织的传闻一事，{cf澪纱}觉得自己有很大的责任。{cf澪纱}决心要守护「平凡的」{cf千纱}，并将挑战书交给老师，并和冲上来的太妹展开战斗。

long.jp: トリニティ総合学園

name.en: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.jp: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.zh_cn: 放学后的甜点故事～甜秘密和枪击战～

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

name.en: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.jp: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.zh_cn: 放学后的甜点故事～甜秘密和枪击战～

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?

突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

name.zh_cn: 为大家举办的大运动会

desc.en: Sensei asks the students of the Anti-Halo Festival Group why they wanted to disrupt the festival so badly and listens to their grievances. Noa and Sensei make some revisions to ensure everyone can enjoy the field day in their own way. Afterwards, all of the Millennium students come together as one to prepare for the competition.
desc.jp: Sensei asks the students of the Anti-Halo Festival Group why they wanted to disrupt the festival so badly and listens to their grievances. Noa and Sensei make some revisions to ensure everyone can enjoy the field day in their own way. Afterwards, all of the Millennium students come together as one to prepare for the competition.
desc.zh_cn: 老师问「晄．反．会」的学生妨碍大运动会的原因，听他们诉说苦衷。后来{cf乃爱}和老师为了营造能让大家开心的大运动会，决定修改部分计划。之后{sn千年}学园的学生便同心协力努力准备大运动会。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: It's a snowy white Christmas morning. Dressed in Santa suits, Serina and Hanae are hard at work preparing for charity activities with Sensei. Meanwhile, Mine heads out to the field while espousing the Remedial Knights' creed of aid and salvation.
desc.jp: It's a snowy white Christmas morning. Dressed in Santa suits, Serina and Hanae are hard at work preparing for charity activities with Sensei. Meanwhile, Mine heads out to the field while espousing the Remedial Knights' creed of aid and salvation.
desc.zh_cn: 降下白雪的圣诞节清晨。穿着圣诞服的{cf芹奈}和{cf花绘}正在和老师一起忙着准备慈善活动。{cf美祢}决定贯彻{cn救护骑士团}应该具备的救护信念，于是便出发前往现场。

long.jp: トリニティ総合学園
トリニティ総合学園

hobby.jp: ダンス、チアリーディング

long.jp: トリニティ総合学園

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

name.zh_cn: 请注意。这是重要的场面（２）

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Toki manage to defeat the Benevolent Thief and secure the Crown, but at that moment, another smoke screen bursts and the Benevolent Thief disappears. Meanwhile, Meitaro tries to escape the mansion, but is knocked out by an unexpected ally.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Toki manage to defeat the Benevolent Thief and secure the Crown, but at that moment, another smoke screen bursts and the Benevolent Thief disappears. Meanwhile, Meitaro tries to escape the mansion, but is knocked out by an unexpected ally.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}和{cf季}击倒慈爱的怪盗且守住了王冠，但眼前突然出现了烟雾弹，慈爱的怪盗也伺机隐藏了踪迹。另一方面，明太郎离开老宅邸企图逃跑，意想不到的帮手登场后，让他陷入昏厥状态。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子

请注意。这是重要的场面（１）

name.en: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.jp: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.zh_cn: 纯白的预告信～虚饰之馆与美学所在之处～

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将{cf桃井}误认为{cnC&C}的{cf宁瑠}──没注意到这点就接下委托的{cf桃井}和{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定换上女仆装扮演{cnC&C}。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

name.en: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.jp: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.zh_cn: 纯白的预告信～虚饰之馆与美学所在之处～

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将{cf桃井}误认为{cnC&C}的{cf宁瑠}──没注意到这点就接下委托的{cf桃井}和{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定换上女仆装扮演{cnC&C}。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

desc.en: The unexpected allies turn out to be C&C members. The group fears that Neru will scold them, but she instead praises them for doing a good job. At the same time, Akira is lost in her own thoughts as she recalls Sensei's words.
desc.jp: The unexpected allies turn out to be C&C members. The group fears that Neru will scold them, but she instead praises them for doing a good job. At the same time, Akira is lost in her own thoughts as she recalls Sensei's words.
desc.zh_cn: 意想不到的帮手就是{cnC&C}的成员们。一行人虽然害怕被{cf宁瑠}斥责，但{cf宁瑠}反而称赞一行人表现得很好。同一时间，晶回想老师说过的话，独自沉浸在感伤当中。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
